article_title: Calpine to Buy Boston-Area Power Plant for $530 Million
article_text:
Calpine Corp. said Monday it will acquire the Fore River Generating Station and related plant inventory from Exelon Corp. for $530 million to expand its presence in the Boston region.

The nominal 809 megawatt, combined-cycle power plant is located southeast of Boston in North Weymouth, Mass., and will boost Calpine's footprint in the region's competitive wholesale power market, the company said. Calpine sells power to utilities and...
